alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 2:54PM EDT until August 07 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Towns County in northeastern Georgia... Northeastern Gilmer County in north central Georgia... Union County in north central Georgia... Fannin County in north central Georgia... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 253 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Copperhill to near Higdon to near Mountaintown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Blue Ridge, Hiawassee, Blairsville, Young Harris, Morganton, Suches, Blue Mountain Shelter, Gumlog, Higdon, Loving, Jones Creek, Woods Hole Shelter, Epworth, Pisgah, Mineral Bluff, Vogel State Park, Cherry Log, Gaddistown, Hemp, and Margret. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
